inclusion.criterion: able to speak and understand Swedish
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: independent walking indoors with or without walking aid and in personal care with exception of bathing/showering.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: documented cognitive impairment ≤ 8 according to the Short Portable Mental Status Questionnaire (SPMSQ)
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of recurrent C diff infections and recent antibx use, but was treated with Vanco for an extended course of 6 weeks.
